title: 2D Transformation
doc: transformation of the local origin of the entity relative to its parent

attributes.name: translation
attributes.doc: position relative to the parent's origin

attributes.name: rotation
attributes.doc: rotation relative to the parent's origin

attributes.name: scale
attributes.doc: scale relative to the parent's origin

attributes.name: worldTranslation
attributes.doc: position relative to the world's origin

attributes.name: worldRotation
attributes.doc: rotation relative to the world's origin

attributes.name: worldScale
attributes.doc: scale relative to the world's origin

attributes.name: worldToLocalMatrix
attributes.doc: 3x3 matrix that transforms a point from world into local coordinates

attributes.name: localToWorldMatrix
attributes.doc: 3x3 matrix that transforms a point from local into world coordinates
